title: Just got Graves and there was a problem...
body: As it says I just got Graves about 15 minutes ago since he was 50% off. It said he was for 440 Riot points but after getting him I lost the full 880 not the 440. I already used my refunds and was wondering if I can get help with this.

replies.body:
Hey Galleni,

For something like this, it's best to [submit a ticket(https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)] to Player Support. They'll be able to resolve this issue for you! :]
You might want to submit a ticket directly to Riot support. Should be a help link on the home page or in the client.
How do I send the ticket, I can find it anywhere.

Scroll to the top of this screen. In the top right corner in Blue writing should be the word "Support"

Click on that.

You'll open a new page, on the top right there will be three options. The first of those three options will be "submit a request" - click there.

This should open the request page, select in the dropdown box "I have a question about League of Legends / Riot Games"

Fill in the boxes on this page. Under the "category" section, click on "Billing and Store" then it will change to a new menu and click on "RP Purchase Errors". 

Hope that's clear ;)
